tooltip.fire_track.good_news.name: Good news!
item.fire_track.lava_track_flame.tooltip:
The mind can also be as hot as lava.
This looks like a great idea... Put it on your boots.
item.fire_track.lava_track_flame.clue: Do something that makes other people's heads burn.
item.fire_track.fire_track_flame.tooltip:
It's as fascinating as a burning night.
This looks like a great idea... Put it on your boots.
item.fire_track.fire_track_flame.clue: Do something that makes others look up in amazement.
item.fire_track.smoke_track_flame.toolti:
It's as disorienting as darkness.
This looks like a great idea... Put it on your boots.
item.fire_track.smoke_track_flame.clue: Do something that makes others blackout.
